item.title: Randon Password
item.description: PowerShell Code I use this code to generate a random password during the automation process of creating a new Server VM. I then add the password to Password Manager with Powershell. #Generate Random text to use for Password $SQLPassword =@( [char[]](65..91 | Get-Random -Count 5) [char[]](97..123 | Get-Random -Count 5) '!','#','(',')' | Get-Random -Count 2 0..9 | Get-Random -Count 4 ) | Sort-Object {Get-Random} $Password = $SQLPassword -join ''
